summary: Water quality is stable and within acceptable ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 7.0-7.5 for optimal growth.
Monitor TDS; ensure it stays below 500 ppm for tilapia.
Keep temperature between 24-30°C; consider cooling methods if it exceeds 30°C.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.037 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.939 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.603 / 23.56 / 29.62 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
